title: Traveler

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Command the shadows to switch two players around at night, swapping all targets against them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not act two nights in a row.
- You may transport yourself. You will not die if you transport yourself into an attack.

desc:
Post 515
*Just a little bit of shadow jumping. Don't throw up, now.*
Roleblock Immune
Control Immune
